name: Santa Claus Endless Run 2017
description:
Hop into the winter snow games. Play snow games & have fun with our Santa Claus!

Have you ever enjoyed endless runner snow games with a Santa that is powerful and entertaining? Hope into our snow game journey with lots of snow, great characters and power-ups and overall a great runner game and flying environment. Do you have it all to master the game and keep the Santa on his track as long as possible. It is one of the best flying and running games you will try this winter and Christmas.

SANTA CLAUS GAMES

Santa Claus needs to finish his original mission. The gifts need to be collected and the obstacles need to be avoided so Santa Claus can take the gifts to the children’s homes. Help him and avoid every little obstacle he may face along the way.

SNOW SKIING AND FLYING

The game requires a little skill from the player. Snow skiing with the reindeers may not always be easy. Learn the physics of the snow skiing in this endless running snow skiing game. The snow skiing sometimes will be high and you’ll need to fly with Santa.

FREE CHRISTMAS GAME

If you love the Christmas spirit, then this Santa Claus game will be your favourite Christmas game to play. The artwork, graphics and sound effects are all themed for Christmas. You will adore every second playing one of the most amazing Christmas games.

HELPFUL POWER-UPS

In the infinite run, Santa will have help from various power-ups. Use them in the journey as they will help you stay longer and run further with Santa and the reindeers.

SANTA GAMES FREE 2017 FEATURES:
- endless runner gameplay
- snow skiing game
- inspired by Santa Claus
- Great amount of power-ups
- Creative and unique obstacles

Snow games for kids with lots of excitement, but also great for any age.
